script.lang: CREATE VIEW v_pledges_projects AS SELECT fp.id AS pledge_id, ac.name AS title, ac.amp_activity_id,ac.amp_team_id,ac.approval_status FROM amp_funding_pledges fp JOIN amp_funding_detail fd ON fd.pledge_id = fp.id JOIN amp_funding fu ON fd.amp_funding_id = fu.amp_funding_id JOIN amp_activity ac ON fu.amp_activity_id = ac.amp_activity_id WHERE ac.amp_team_id IS NOT NULL AND ac.deleted = false AND ac.draft!=true GROUP BY ac.amp_activity_id, fp.id, ac.name,ac.amp_team_id,ac.approval_status;
